page.title: 09PARISH COUNCIL OF SOUTHREPPS
page.content: COMPOSITION: Chairman, vice-Chairman and seven Councillors plus paid Clerk. FUNCTION: 1. Voluntary elected consultative body to whom N. Norfolk D.C. forwards planning application for approval. 2. Liase woth local orgs. incl. Highways,anglian Water etc./, for problems connected with water, sewerage, roads. footpaths, street lights, etc. 3. To allocate allotments at peppercorn rents. 4. Maintentance of recreation ground and certain areas of common use incl. footpath access. 5. Supervise common land which will become Parish Council property shortly. ELECTIONS: Every four years, Chairman and v. Chairman annually. MEETINGS: Monthly - alternatively Village Hall and Lower Street Social Club.
